comment_text: I wanted to find out what the statute of limitation for rape is in the USA, because under German law (20 years starting with the victims 18th birthday), the rapist could very well be punished. And found out, that each state has their own regulation. I am all for federalism, but 16/50 different rape laws?
author: allendoerfer
story_title: Despite DNA, the Rapist Got Away
